text: Fhe Bakɨmen Kameŋ, ne guma guara gegap, zerav, nzan rɨgar ki. Fhe Bakɨme mba tara bavira ki. Anan tɨvir vhuuiŋ guarira gum ŋkasŋka bakɨme anan ki. Nza vhɨra ana tɨvir vhuuiŋ guarira gum ana ŋkasŋka bakɨme gangi. Anan tɨvir vhuuiŋ guarira gum kora muumbara bakɨme guigira anan ki. Ana vhɨra guigira Fhe Bakɨmen nza khɨvigi.
